body: Still waiting, but I'm afraid that I'll need to check the tags in every chapter, I'm not a NTR hater nor lover but a NTR on this serie would be a killer wound, our little MC is just a kid can't do anything even if he wants to, I normally don't care about being NTR because usually the Mc has capacity to fix the things but won't fix because he's weak but this one is just a KIDDO (suffering before the time) :’)
Only thing i like is the art... with ntr in the horizon i dont want to like more than that... T^T
